briefdescription.para: ADCMSP432E4 reference source These fields are used by ADCMSP432E4_HWAttrs to specify the reference voltage for each channel.
ADCMSP432E4 Sequencer These fields are used by ADCMSP432E4_HWAttrs to specify the sample sequencer for each channel.

detaileddescription.para: Each ADC module contains four programmable sequencers allowing the sampling of multiple analog input sources without controller intervention.

briefdescription.para: ADCMSP432E4 Module These fields are used by ADCMSP432E4_HWAttrs to specify the ADC module for each channel.
ADC driver implementation for the ADC peripheral on MSP432E4.

detaileddescription.para: This ADC driver implementation is designed to operate on a ADC peripheral for MSP432E4.
Refer to ADC.h for a complete description of APIs & example of use.
